reviewText: I very much enjoy information on railroads and I like to refer to this over and over.
summary: When Giants Roamed: The Golden Age of Steam (The History Channel)
Title: When Giants Roamed: The Golden Age of Steam

reviewText: My husband's father loves anything having to do with trains.  This item made my Christmas list for him. He seemed to enjoy it.
Title: When Giants Roamed: The Golden Age of Steam

reviewText: My husband has always been interested in the railroad and when we watched this,I became interested too. I'm glad we bought this,because I learned a lot from it. I would suggest it to anyone.
Title: When Giants Roamed: The Golden Age of Steam

reviewText: This is a well done DVD.  My husband loves watching it.  He is a steam train nut.  Nice sound, too.
Title: When Giants Roamed: The Golden Age of Steam

reviewText: Excellent coverage of some of steam age.  Even those who haven't experienced steam first hand will really go for this one.
Title: When Giants Roamed: The Golden Age of Steam

reviewText: I'm just old enough to remember the switch from steam to diesel and fondly remember the smoking monsters.  Very enjoyable.
Title: When Giants Roamed: The Golden Age of Steam

reviewText: With a combination of archival and modern footage, this documentary cannot be beaten for showing just what it is about steam trains that is so enchanting (and dirty). You will learn about the mechanics involved in operating a steam train and enjoy lots of great shots that are hard to see in person anymore.
Title: When Giants Roamed: The Golden Age of Steam

reviewText: I thought this CD was pretty good,. I liked to see these old trains. Both my grandads worked on the Southern railroad at this time. I remember as a child in Sheffield,Alabama when they lined them up to go to the scrap yard.  So sad even as a kid.
summary: This CD will get it for you.
Title: When Giants Roamed: The Golden Age of Steam

reviewText: This was a gift that was well received by a train enthusiast.  The DVD movie quality was very satisfactory per the gift recipient.
summary: A gift well received by a train enthusiast
Title: When Giants Roamed: The Golden Age of Steam

reviewText: Happy with the price and quality of the dvd.It arrived when promised and is a great addition to my Steam locomotive dvd collection.
Title: When Giants Roamed: The Golden Age of Steam

reviewText: For the history and railroad/train fan.  I bought this as a gift for my dad who is into trains big-time.  He is hard to please, and liked this.
Title: When Giants Roamed: The Golden Age of Steam
